description: Try our easy to follow Berry Piklets  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pikelet,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Berry Piklets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sift the flour, baking powder and salt into a bowl.
In a separate bowl, beat the egg and sugar with a whisk until pale and thick.
Add the egg mixture and the milk to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Gently heat a nonstick frying pan and drop tablespoonfuls of the mixture in to form perfect circles.
When bubbles start to burst on the top of the pikelets, turn them over and cook the second side until golden. Move onto a clean teatowel to cool.
Fold 3 tablespoons of Barker’s Boysenberry Jam through 1 cup of coconut yoghurt. Spread an even layer between each pikelet stacked.
